text:
Flaminia Jandolo (February 11, 1930 – May 22, 2019) was an Italian actress and voice actress. She dubbed many animated characters in Italian such as Lady in "Lady and the Tramp", the fairy Merryweather in "Sleeping Beauty", Perdita in "One Hundred and One Dalmatians" and Mrs. Brisby in "The Secret of NIMH".
Jandolo died on May 22, 2019 in Rome at the age of 89.
